mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS RN ,T1.CLASSIFICATION_ID ,T1.CLASSIFICATION_NAME ,T1.PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID ,CASE WHEN T1.PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID = 0 THEN '-' ELSE ( SELECT A1.CLASSIFICATION_NAME FROM TB_CLASSIFICATION A1 WHERE A1.CLASSIFICATION_ID = T1.PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID ) end as PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_NAME ,T1.CLASSIFICATION_TYPE ,T1.CLASSIFICATION_IMAGE ,T1.SORT_ORDER ,T1.DEPTH_NUM ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_CLASSIFICATION T1 ORDER BY T1.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT T1.CLASSIFICATION_ID ,T1.PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID ,T1.CLASSIFICATION_NAME ,T1.CLASSIFICATION_TYPE ,T1.CLASSIFICATION_IMAGE ,T1.SORT_ORDER ,T1.DEPTH_NUM ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_CLASSIFICATION T1 WHERE T1.CLASSIFICATION_ID = #{classificationId}

SELECT Z1.CLAS_ID, Z1.CLAS_NAME, Z1.CHILD_CLAS_ID, Z1.PRENT_ID, Z1.SORT_ORDER, Z1.STATUS, CASE WHEN Z1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' ELSE '未激活' END AS STATUS_NAME FROM ( SELECT T1.CLASSIFICATION_ID AS CLAS_ID, T1.CLASSIFICATION_NAME AS CLAS_NAME, 0 AS CHILD_CLAS_ID, 0 AS PRENT_ID, T1.SORT_ORDER AS SORT_ORDER, T1.STATUS FROM TB_CLASSIFICATION T1 WHERE T1.PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID = 0 AND (IFNULL(#{classificationId}, '') = '' OR T1.CLASSIFICATION_ID = #{classificationId}) UNION ALL SELECT T1.CLASSIFICATION_ID AS CLAS_ID, T2.CLASSIFICATION_NAME AS CLAS_NAME, T2.CLASSIFICATION_ID AS CHILD_CLAS_ID, T2.PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID AS PRENT_ID, T2.SORT_ORDER AS SORT_ORDER, T2.STATUS FROM TB_CLASSIFICATION T1 INNER JOIN TB_CLASSIFICATION T2 ON T1.CLASSIFICATION_ID = T2.PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID WHERE T2.PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID <> 0 AND (IFNULL(#{classificationId}, '') = '' OR T2.PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID = #{classificationId}) GROUP BY T1.CLASSIFICATION_ID,T2.CLASSIFICATION_ID,T2.PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID ) Z1 ORDER BY Z1.CLAS_ID,Z1.SORT_ORDER
SELECT * FROM TB_CLASSIFICATION T1 WHERE T1.PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID = 0

select classification_id ,t1.parent_classification_id ,t1.classification_name ,t1.classification_type ,t1.classification_image ,t1.sort_order ,t1.depth_num ,t1.option01 ,t1.option02 ,t1.option03 ,t1.option04 ,t1.option05 ,date_format(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as create_time ,date_format(t1.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as update_time from TB_CLASSIFICATION t1 where t1.status = '1' and t1.classification_type in ( select a1.code_cd from tb_common_code a1 where a1.code_cd = t1.classification_type and a1.code_type = 'BOARD_TYPE' and a1.code_cd = '01' and a1.use_yn = '1' )
